Lyric:
[by:小陀螺Tony]
[ti:Don't Let Me Down (Illenium Remix)]
[ar:ILLENIUM Daya 405599648]
[al:]
[by:九九Lrc歌词网～www.99Lrc.net]
[00:12.75]Crashing, hit a wall
[00:15.58]Right now I need a miracle
[00:18.36]Hurry up now, I need a miracle
[00:24.69]Stranded, reaching out
[00:27.21]I call your name but you're not around
[00:30.75]I say your name but you're not around
[00:33.43]
[00:34.29]I need you, I need you, I need you right now
[00:38.94]Yeah, I need you right now
[00:41.89]So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
[00:45.18]I think I'm losing my mind now
[00:47.20]It's in my head, darling I hope
[00:49.94]That you'd be here
[00:51.40]When I need you the most
[00:53.28]So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
[00:57.68]Don't let me down yaaaa
[01:04.14]Don't let me down, don't let me down, down, down...
[01:50.28]
[01:54.67]Running out of time
[01:58.01]I really thought you were on my side
[02:00.99]But now there's nobody by my side
[02:04.33]
[02:05.24]I need you, I need you, I need you right now
[02:08.82]Yeah, I need you right now
[02:11.91]So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
[02:15.15]I think I'm losing my mind now
[02:17.32]It's in my head, darling I hope
[02:20.01]That you'd be here when I need you the most
[02:23.14]So don't let me, don't let me, don't let me down
[02:26.88]Don't let me down
[02:29.16]
[02:34.16]Don't let me down
[02:39.93]Don't let me down, down, down
[02:46.04]Don't let me down, down, down
[02:50.30]Don't let me down, down, down
[02:53.78]Don't let me down, don't let me down, down, down..
[03:20.44]
